title: Lance IP
responsibilities: Manage and maintain the company’s primary website, ensuring smooth performance, high uptime, and timely content updates.
Monitor website performance, troubleshoot technical issues proactively, and implement improvements to enhance speed and user experience.
Optimize on-page SEO through improved metadata, structured content, and well-organized site architecture to boost search engine visibility.
Collaborate with internal teams to align website updates with marketing goals and brand standards.
Ensure website security by performing regular plugin updates, backups, and vulnerability checks.

title: Lance IP
responsibilities: Set up and configured a new sub-domain with full e-commerce capabilities using WooCommerce, including secure payment workflows.
Integrated third-party plugins and APIs to extend the website’s functionality and improve user experience.
Implemented responsive design principles to ensure seamless performance across desktops, tablets, and mobile devices.
Enhanced website structure, navigation, and metadata to support organic SEO growth and search visibility.
Advised on and implemented new technologies to improve website functionality and internal team efficiency.

title: Career Corps
responsibilities: Contributed to building a peer-to-peer (P2P) file-sharing application as part of a team of 3 using Kotlin and React Native.
Assisted in developing UI/UX components that enhanced user navigation, accessibility, and visual appeal.
Debugged and troubleshot application issues to improve stability and performance.
Adapted quickly to changing client requirements and delivered updates under tight deadlines.
Participated in team discussions, feature planning, and code reviews to ensure quality and consistency.

title: VibeByte Media
responsibilities: Developed advanced Python-based web scraping tools to automate data collection for multiple clients.
Collaborated with a team of 5 to build scalable scraping pipelines using BeautifulSoup, Selenium, and custom logic.
Created high-accuracy scrapers for platforms such as LinkedIn, Google Maps, and other data-heavy websites.
Implemented new scraping techniques to improve accuracy, efficiency, and error handling in data extraction.
Contributed to brainstorming sessions and feature planning to deliver innovative automation solutions.

title: Association for Computing Machinery BVPDET-NM
responsibilities: Managed and updated the official ACM chapter website to ensure accurate content and user-friendly navigation.
Improved the site’s UI/UX by enhancing design, layout consistency, and accessibility for visitors and members.
Collaborated with various ACM teams to align website content with events, workshops, and chapter initiatives.
Strategically integrated new web technologies to modernize the platform and improve performance.
Worked with a team of 5 to implement innovative features that enhanced community engagement and functionality.

title: Edunet Foundation
responsibilities: Completed assigned AI tasks and project milestones focused on solving real-world challenges using machine learning techniques.
Delivered a structured project presentation demonstrating technical understanding and problem-solving skills.
Gained hands-on experience in AI workflows, contributing to personal and professional growth.
Collaborated with peers and mentors to refine project goals and outputs.
Earned certifications from IBM and Edunet Foundation for successful project completion.

title: Association Internationale des Étudiants en Sciences Économiques et Commerciales
responsibilities: Facilitated youth-focused educational sessions aimed at building leadership and personal development.
Empowered students through engaging activities and discussions designed to create transformative learning experiences.
Inspired young participants to contribute to positive social change and global impact.
